name: DeepestMine
description:
Simple game for Ludum Dare #48

Play as faction of dwarfs deep underground. There is no tutorial, so try this:

  1. Move camera on WASD
  2. You have a Castle (HQ rect), where you can **recruit dwarves** to fight for you
  3. You can create buildings. Currently available are: Power Plant which is used for lighting surroundings, Barricades (walls) and Factory for some dwarves upgrades.
  4. Each dwarf initially has a pickaxe. You can select him by **left click** and send them to the nearest ore vein by **right click** to gather resources
  5. While dwarf is selected, you can upgrade his weapon and armor **(Note: dwarf can not gather resources with any weapon except pickaxe)**

Be quick and prepare your defenses, because angry bugs soon will come to your base.

This version could be buggy, unbalanced and unplayable at all and I'm really sorry for that. It was my first solo gamejam and I ran out of time. But more content to come, so stay tuned!

Source code: https://github.com/SmelJey/DeepestMine
